availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Collins D. Bradley (Trigg County, KY, attorney)

body.p: Cadiz, Trigg County, Kentucky, attorney. Virginia native. Married to Virginia Waddill Bradley on December 25, 1832 in Trigg County. Married to Mary Jenkins Bradley on May 21, 1850 in Trigg County. Father of William G. Bradley, Daniel H. Bradley, and Anna Bradley. Attorney in Trigg County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in 1850 in Trigg County. Attorney in Cadiz in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Cadiz in 1860.
